thread.title: SPI Energy Co., Ltd. Signed a Strategic Agreement with 500 IPO Fund for Bitcoin Miner Hosting Service

author: cnbc.com
title: SPI Energy Co., Ltd. Signed a Strategic Agreement with 500 IPO Fund for Bitcoin Miner Hosting Service
text:
HONG KONG, April 16, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- SPI Energy Co., Ltd. ("SPI Energy" or the "Company") (Nasdaq:SPI), SPI Energy Co., Ltd. is a global provider of renewable energy solutions and cryptocurrencies miner hosting service for business, residential, government and utility customers and investors. Today announced that its wholly-owned subsidiary, SPI Solar Inc. has signed an agreement with 500 IPO Fund base at Santa Clara, California for 5,000 units Bitcoin miner hosting services.
About SPI Energy Co., Ltd.
SPI Energy Co., Ltd. is a global provider of renewable energy solutions and cryptocurrencies miner hosting service for business, residential, government and utility customers and investors. SPI Energy focuses on the EPC/BT, storage and O2O PV market including the development, financing, installation, operation and sale of utility-scale and residential PV projects in China, Japan, Europe and North America. The Company operates an online energy e-commerce and investment platform in China, B2B e-commerce platform offering a range of PV, storage products in Australia as well as online platform ( www.Globalming.com ) offering global VIP miner hosting service. The Company has its operating headquarters in Hong Kong and maintains global operations in Asia, Europe, North America and Australia.
About 500 IPO Fund
500 IPO Fund is a dynamic venture capital ecosystem, which consists of top notch venture capital firms, powerful government resources, countless entrepreneurs and elite professionals. Our mission is to promote projects which help solve major social issues and create well being for the whole world. 500 IPO believes that the best way to solve social issues is: innovation! To learn from or cooperate with the innovative intellectuals! We connect China with Silicon Valley.
For additional information, please visit: http://investors.spisolar.com
For investors and media inquiries please contact:
